item.title: Change Shop Prices Help - Code Included -
item.dc:creator: @xron89 xron89
item.description:
@xron89 wrote:

I need to change the prices of a few items, bandos, furys, whips this is the text included inside Shops folder
Shops>ShopAssistant.java

[size=12pt]This Is Part Of The Code Ask If You Want More[/size]

	}
		if (c.myShopId == 48) {
			c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Slayer points.");
			return;
		}
		if (ShopValue >= 1000 && ShopValue < 1000000) {
			ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)";
		} else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) {
			ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000) + " million)";
		}
		c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd);
	}
	
	public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {
		switch (id) {
			case 6889:

	/**
	*Sell item to shop (Shop Price)
	**/
	public void sellToShopPrice(int removeId, int removeSlot) {
		for (int i : Config.ITEM_SELLABLE) {
